outputs.output_descr: The project is aimed at enhancing the capacity of rural communities (especially women and youth) to participate in decision-making and management of natural resources and ecosystem in order to increase the benefits from environmental management. The Community-Based Natural Resources Management approach presents an opportunity for the profile of rural communities to meaningfully participate in and benefit from co-management of natural resources with state institutions.

project_descr: Enhanced community capacity for natural resources and ecosystem management, and benefit distribution
project_title: Community Capacity for NRM & Benefit Acquisition
